text:
Dear partners,

	 

	We hereby notify you that, according to our accounting records, on 19.09.2022, after having entered in the accounts the receipts of the previous days, TIBIEL EOOD is recorded with 3 (three) outstanding invoices issued for the contracted natural gas transmission services, particularly:

	 

	1.	Invoice no. 20224079/18.08.2022, due on 23.08.2022, amounting to 1.759,68 lei;
	2.	Invoice no. 20224360/05.09.2022, due on 10.09.2022, amounting to 13.210,37 lei;
	3.	Invoice no. 20224389/08.09.2022, due on 13.09.2022, amounting to 4.528,81 lei. 

	 

	TOTAL outstanding balance, as at 19.09.2022 = 19.498,86 lei.

	 

	 

	Please check whether these invoices, mentioned above, have been omitted for payment (as payments have been recorded for transmission invoices issued and forwarded later to those in question!). and, if they are confirmed to be overdue, pay them as soon as possible and send us the proof of payment by e-mail.

	 

	To assist you in identifying and registering the invoices in question, please find attached the e-mails by which they were sent in the first instance. At the same time, we are also sending you the composition of the transmission balance as at 19.09.2022, respectfully requesting that you also pay the other invoices according to the due date.

	 

	Thank you for your cooperation!

	 

	Best regards,

	 

	Transgaz’ team
subject: FW: Transgaz - TIBIEL
